channel.title: Sso
channel.description:
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2yp12rm.png[/img]
Came with the base Finished Being worked on
[img]http://i.imgur.com/xyE1v.png[/img] Started project
[b]Switchable spawn points[/b]
[ul][li]Edgeville Falador [color=green]Lumbridge Varrock[/li][/ul]
[b]Chaos Elemental[/b]
[ul][li]Teleport Attack[/li] [li]Removement of requipment attack[/li][/ul]
[b]King black dragon[/b]
[ul][li]Two types of melee attack Ice breath Shock breath Poison breath Fire breath Anti-dragonfire shield protects you from the dragon's fire[/li][/ul]
[b]Enchanting[/b]
[ul][li]Sapphire Enchant Emeral Enchant Ruby Enchant Onyx Enchant[/li][/ul]
[b]Magic[/b]
[ul][li]Casting timers Autocasting
Basic magic maxhit & defence formula[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://aganoth.com/media.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/29vjQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uW6zh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JnWnN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NaQKH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hr4D7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/EzB04.png[/img]

item.title: Sso
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:17, topic:473052”][quote author=TimeTM link=topic=590944.msg4181667#msg4181667 date=1355608027]

I have a question.

I see:

Server: Ice Breath

Being written in your Chat Box. Is this your way of discerning the attack a N.P.C. uses?

Yes, yes it is. The king black dragon is breathing ice, that freezes the opponent.
[/quote]

In this case, you’re probably doing more than people realize. How much behind the scenes work are you doing? I highly recommend you create a Developmental Log so people can see things like this.[/quote]

Well I haven’t updated this thread to the fullest, only check this thread once in a while.

Read full topic

item.title: Sso
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“TimeTM, post:16, topic:473052”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=590944.msg4181627#msg4181627 date=1355605070]
I have a question.

I see:

Server: Ice Breath

Being written in your Chat Box. Is this your way of discerning the attack a N.P.C. uses?
[/quote]

Yes, yes it is. The king black dragon is breathing ice, that freezes the opponent.[/quote]

In this case, you’re probably doing more than people realize. How much behind the scenes work are you doing? I highly recommend you create a Developmental Log so people can see things like this.

Read full topic

item.title: Sso
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

KroniKz_:

HA! If you reached over 800 legit players, we would know about you. Now stop lieing and grow up.

Know all about me? Haha, okay buddy, sabsabionline goes all the way back to 2008 :eek:

e7xe78.png758×492

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:12, topic:473052”][quote author=TimeTM link=topic=590944.msg4180918#msg4180918 date=1355522657]

  • If you base me on how mature I am from my game server banner, you must be quite mature yourself.
    [/quote]

Your logic is deadly.[/quote]

Not at all, if there’s anyone who’s immature it must be the one who keep yapping about it and won’t stop, whilst i’m simply chilled out and really don’t give a rat’s ass about what he’s saying

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

KroniKz_:

Now OP is calling us immature because we are giving him good criticism. Look, buddy, you’re not the one judging us, the players are when they see your server and when they see the banner and slogo that says fuck Jagex, they are just going to ignore it and find another server.

We’ve had this slogan for a year now, never gave us any troubles whatsoever, that being peaking over 800 players
